title: "Blumind utilizes analog semiconductor architecture to facilitate AI inferencing"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence development and adoption have encountered serious energy efficiency hurdles with current computer architectures. To solve this challenge, Canadian startup Blumind has invented an analog architecture for semiconductors that will process neural networks efficiently with extremely low power consumption."
